title: First Ear, Now DragonTroopBeta?
body:
These are dark times.  They know I stand in opposition to their tyranny so that means I'm probably next.

A moment of silence for the fallen, RIP.

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

Edit: DTB was banned for bad mouthing Wuks, "Verbal Aggression" Ban and was banned by Wuks
